name: HearingVoices
0:
”Alexa, open Hearing Voices”
”Alexa, start Hearing Voices”
”Alexa, begin Hearing Voices”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hearing voices
des:
Hearing Voices allows the user to experience an audio version of a magazine, that is useful to every Alexa user. Those who want to learn how to create their own skills, will find it especially helpful, because it will include a lot of information on the creation of skills. Our 'audiozine' will contain only skills that were made without programming! 

The skill has TWELVE different built-in sections (chapters), with most having at least two subsections. 
The sections are:
Games
Facts
Stories 
Word
Sounds 
Education 
Today
Skills
Reviews
Article
Tricks
and 
Feedback

Like all other skills, you can say:

"Alexa, open Hearing Voices"
"Alexa, start Hearing Voices"
"Alexa, begin Hearing Voices"

Please leave a review if you like this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions to freeinfo@freeacademy.com. We even have a website that is dedicated to the skill called HearingVoices.ca. We hope that you will provide us with feedback to include in subsequent 'issues' of the skill. We plan to add new content to the skill as often as possible, at least monthly, but certain parts will be updated daily. 

All content, even from previous issues of Hearing Voices, will ALWAYS be accessible in some way, either as a separate skill, or on the website.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
